contents.content: 第二章 动词的时态
第三节 拓展练习10题

The disappointing results of many conventional road transport projects in Africa led some experts to rethink the strategy by which rural transport problems were to be tackled at the beginning of the 1980s.

contents.title: 所有这么多的游客意味着我们不得不扩大经营，现在它成了一个真正的家族企业。

contents.content: At first I couldn't understand what the lecturers were talking about, so I had to turn to the books and journals.
I had never seen one and I hadn't been particularly interested in them at school.
My parents had been saying that as I already had a job, I ought to support myself through college.
Over the past nine years, Street Kids International (SKI) has been working with partner organisations in Africa, Latin America and India to support the economic lives of street youth.

These discoveries have led to the field known as neuroeconomics, which studies the brain's secrets to success in an economic environment that demands innovation and being able to do things differently from competitors.
He will also go through the security arrangements with you and show you the fire exits.
From her earnings she was able to finance her sister Bronia's medical studies in Paris, on the understanding that Bronia would, in turn, later help her to get an education.
The farming economy would almost certainly have required much larger communities to do all the work needed to plant and tend sufficient crops to sustain them through the year.
All these visitors mean we have had to expand our operation and it's now a truly family concern.
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句的时态是一般过去时，谓语是led；by which引导的是定语从句，修饰the strategy，时态是一般过去将来时，谓语是were to be tackled，是“were+动词不定式”的特殊结构。
语法破解：so前面是一个主从复合句，主句的时态是一般过去时，谓语是couldn't understand；what引导的是宾语从句，时态是过去进行时，谓语是were talking about。so后面是一个简单句，时态是一般过去时，谓语是had to turn to。
语法破解：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，and前后句子的时态都是过去完成时，谓语分别是had never seen和hadn't been particularly interested in。
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。主句的时态是过去完成进行时，谓语是had been saying；that引导的是宾语从句。该宾语从句本身又是一个主从复合句，as引导的是原因状语从句，时态是一般过去时，谓语是had；主句的时态是一般过去时，谓语是ought to support。
语法破解：这是一个简单句，时态是现在完成进行时，谓语是has been working with。
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。主句的时态是现在完成时，谓语是have led to；which引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰neuroeconomics。该从句本身又是一个主从复合句，主句和that引导的定语从句的时态都是一般现在时，谓语分别是studies和demands。
语法破解：这是一个含有并列谓语的简单句，时态是一般将来时，谓语是will…go through…and show。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句的时态是一般过去时，谓语是was able to finance；on the understanding that引导的是条件状语从句，时态是一般过去将来时，谓语是would…help。
语法破解：这是一个简单句，时态是过去将来完成时，谓语是would…have required。
语法破解：and前是一个主从复合句，主句的时态是一般现在时，谓语是mean；we have had to expand our operation是省略了引导词that的宾语从句，时态是现在完成时，谓语是have had to expand。and后是一个简单句，时态是一般现在时，is是系动词。
